PACKAG 
 IDENT main
SCOLON 
  FUNC 
 IDENT main
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LBRACE 
   VAR 
 IDENT i
   I32 i32
  ASGN =
INTLIT 4
SCOLON 
   VAR 
 IDENT s
   STR 
  ASGN =
 IDENT sprintf
LPAREN 
STRLIT %d
 COMMA 
 IDENT i
 INCOP 
RPAREN 
SCOLON 
 IDENT printf
LPAREN 
STRLIT '%s'
